data.title: Statement of Persons Nominated
data.meta_description: Statement of Persons Nominated and Notice of Poll for the Tunbridge Wells constituency. UK Parliamentary General Election on Thursday 4 July 2024.
data.text:
Statement of Persons Nominated and Notice of Poll

UK Parliamentary Election

For the Tunbridge Wells Constituency

Notice is hereby given that:

A poll for the election of a Member of Parliament for Tunbridge Wells will be held on Thursday 4 July 2024, between the hours of 7:00 am and 10:00 pm.

One Member of Parliament is to be elected.

The names, home addresses and descriptions of the Candidates remaining validly nominated for election and the names of all persons signing the Candidatesâ€™ nomination paper are as follows:
